# Force Ladder (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One ladder of force up to 60 ft. long

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 97

*You concentrate on the small silver model of the ladder in your outstretched hand. A transparent ladder, visible only by its edges, appears.*

You create an immobile transparent ladder made of force. The ladder is 2 feet wide and anywhere from 10 to 60 feet long, with rungs spaced 1 foot apart. The ladder functions as a normal ladder and can support any weight. It can be destroyed by anything that destroys a *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]*.

*Focus:* A miniature silver ladder (50 gp).
